{"name": "Department of Education Free Meals Food Truck", "alternate_name": "", "description": "USDA National Hunger Hotline (Hunger Free America): 1-866-3-HUNGRY or 1-877-8-HAMBRE (para español)
Text the USDA National Hunger Hotline at  914-415-6617 with a question containing the words food, summer, or meals for resources near you.
HRA’s Emergency Food Hotline: 866-888-8777
Shelter or Temporary Housing Assistance: 3-1-1", "email": "", "url": "https://www.nycfoodpolicy.org/nyc-food-resource-guide-flushing-whitestone/", "status": "active", "address": {"address_1": "29-66 137th St", "address_2": null, "city": "New York", "state_province": "NY", "postal_code": "11354", "country": "US"}, "location": {"latitude": 40.7702563, "longitude": -73.8311312}, "phones": [{"number": "(866) 348-6479", "type": "voice"}], "regular_schedule": [{"weekday": "Monday", "opens_at": "12:30", "closes_at": "18:30"}, {"weekday": "Tuesday", "opens_at": "12:30", "closes_at": "18:30"}, {"weekday": "Wednesday", "opens_at": "12:30", "closes_at": "18:30"}, {"weekday": "Thursday", "opens_at": "12:30", "closes_at": "18:30"}, {"weekday": "Friday", "opens_at": "12:30", "closes_at": "18:30"}], "service_attributes": [{"attribute_key": "INFO", "attribute_value": "No ID is required."}]}
